game.name: Psycho Wolf
game.shortDescription: Psycho wolf is an indie stealth game, which draws inspiration for its unique graphic style from the first 3D games of mid 90's. Gameplay itself is the evolution of the best mechanics encountered in modern games.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Psycho wolf is an indie stealth game, which draws inspiration for its unique graphic style from the first 3D games of mid 90's. Gameplay itself is the evolution of the best mechanics encountered in modern games.
game.publishers: Ultimate Games S.A., Falcon Games S.A.

reviewHighlights.text: 누명을 쓴 늑대가되어 동물들을 죽이는 게임. 반복 노동이 지루할수있지만 취향이면 맞을듯
